attributes.action: Get Jeremy Hunt to have an interview with Jeremy Paxman and the BMA.
attributes.background: I am a doctor, GP to be precise. I know full well how myself and the rest of my hard working colleagues feel about Jeremy Hunt and what he is doing to the NHS. I think most of my colleagues whatever the specialty would like answers, and Jeremy Paxman gets them.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament can't compel Jeremy Paxman or the BMA to do this.
